TMDA Download

Please make sure you've read the Requirements page first!

Development Sources:

The development branch of TMDA is currently available only through CVS, and nightly snapshot tarballs made from CVS. If you are using development code you should probably also be reading the tmda-workers and tmda-cvs lists to stay abreast of changes. Please note that what you're getting is probably not even a bleeding-edge TMDA, but a severly hemorrhaging one.
  • CVS Access:
    The TMDA development sources can be accessed via anonymous (pserver) CVS through module tmda.

  • Nightly Snapshots:
    Snapshots of the current development sources are checked out from CVS and tarballed each morning at 05:00 UTC.
rsync access:
  • The TMDA web site is available via anonymous rsync at rsync://tmda.net/tmdaweb/
    This includes all the HTML pages as well as the releases/ and snapshots/ directories.
